record.field:
Some attachments are used on interactions with the following parties:
%(parties)s
Going on will break the links.
Birth date can't be in the future: %(name)s - %(birthdate)s
Identifier type is used. Deletion impossible.
Parties have different first names: %(source_name)s vs %(destination_name)s.
"%(value)s" into the address line "%(line)s" exceeds the configuration limit of character(s) (%(max)s) for the country "%(country)s".
You cannot modify this zip code: %(zip_info)s as it is used in other addresses. Add a new zipcode instead.
